name: Mathematics I
description: An introductory course to fundamental mathematical concepts including algebra, calculus, and geometry.

topics.name: Algebra
topics.description: Study of mathematical symbols and rules for manipulating these symbols.

topics.name: Calculus
topics.description: Study of change and motion, through derivatives and integrals.

topics.name: Geometry
topics.description: Study of shapes, sizes, and properties of space.
